Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC25923 (MIC=15.00 µg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus ATCC43300 (MRSA) (MIC=12.50 µg/ml), Bacillus subtilis (MIC=18.75 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli ML-35P (MIC=25.00 µg/ml).Yeast:Candida albicans ATCC2002 (MIC=18.75 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Peptidomics and genomics analysis of novel antimicrobial peptides from the frog, Rana nigrovittata.
Literature.Author: Ma Y, Liu C, Liu X, Wu J, Yang H, Wang Y, Li J, Yu H, Lai R.
